docs.snippet: A new prison uprising in Brazil early on Sunday left four dead, adding to the chaos in Brazil's penitentiary system that has left almost 100 inmates killed in the past week in a gang war....
docs.lead_paragraph: A new prison uprising in Brazil early on Sunday left four dead, adding to the chaos in Brazil's penitentiary system that has left almost 100 inmates killed in the past week in a gang war.

headline.main: New Brazil Prison Clash Leaves at Least Four Dead in Amazon Region
headline.print_headline: New Brazil Prison Clash Leaves at Least Four Dead in Amazon Region

docs.snippet: For hundreds of Muscovites, the fact that the temperature had plunged to minus-27 Celsius (minus-17 F) was no reason to avoid going for a group bicycle ride....
docs.lead_paragraph: For hundreds of Muscovites, the fact that the temperature had plunged to minus-27 Celsius (minus-17 F) was no reason to avoid going for a group bicycle ride.

headline.main: 500 Muscovites Brave Intense Cold for Bike Ride
headline.print_headline: 500 Muscovites Brave Intense Cold for Bike Ride

docs.snippet: Air strikes escalated on Sunday in a rebel-held valley near Damascus containing the Syrian capital's main water supply, a day after insurgents and the government failed to agree a plan to repair the springs knocked out of service two weeks ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: Air strikes escalated on Sunday in a rebel-held valley near Damascus containing the Syrian capital's main water supply, a day after insurgents and the government failed to agree a plan to repair the springs knocked out of service two weeks ago.

headline.main: Syrian Air Strikes Resume on Rebel-Held Damascus Water-Source Valley
headline.print_headline: Syrian Air Strikes Resume on Rebel-Held Damascus Water-Source Valley

docs.snippet: The Israeli soldiers were killed as they were getting off a bus, an episode that the police called an act of terrorism....

headline.main: 4 Die in Jerusalem Attack as Palestinian Rams Truck Into Soldiers
headline.print_headline: 4 Are Killed as Truck Driver Rams Group of Israeli Soldiers

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Myra Noveck from Jerusalem; Rami Nazzal from Ramallah, West Bank; Majd al-Waheidi from Gaza; and Sewell Chan from London.

docs.snippet: Italy's maverick 5-Star Movement should cut ties with the anti-European Union UK Independence Party (UKIP) and consider hooking up with the Liberals in the European Parliament, 5-Star founder Beppe Grillo said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy's maverick 5-Star Movement should cut ties with the anti-European Union UK Independence Party (UKIP) and consider hooking up with the Liberals in the European Parliament, 5-Star founder Beppe Grillo said on Sunday.

headline.main: Founder of Italy's 5-Star Proposes Divorce From UKIP in EU Parliament
headline.print_headline: Founder of Italy's 5-Star Proposes Divorce From UKIP in EU Parliament

docs.snippet: Bulgarian Grigor Dimitrov ended a two-and-a-half year trophy drought on Sunday after outlasting Kei Nishikori of Japan in an absorbing final at the Brisbane International....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bulgarian Grigor Dimitrov ended a two-and-a-half year trophy drought on Sunday after outlasting Kei Nishikori of Japan in an absorbing final at the Brisbane International.

headline.main: Dimitrov Ends Trophy Drought With Brisbane Title
headline.print_headline: Dimitrov Ends Trophy Drought With Brisbane Title

docs.snippet: Norwegian mass murderer Anders Behring Breivik, who killed 77 people in a bombing and shooting rampage in 2011, is returning to court this week as the government appeals a ruling that his isolation in prison breaches the European Convention on Hum...
docs.lead_paragraph: Norwegian mass murderer Anders Behring Breivik, who killed 77 people in a bombing and shooting rampage in 2011, is returning to court this week as the government appeals a ruling that his isolation in prison breaches the European Convention on Human Rights.

headline.main: Norwegian Mass Murderer Breivik in Human Rights Appeal Case
headline.print_headline: Norwegian Mass Murderer Breivik in Human Rights Appeal Case

docs.lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber blew himself up in a crowded marketplace in eastern Baghdad on Sunday, killing at least seven people and wounding over a dozen others, police and medical sources said.

headline.main: Suicide Bomb Attack Kills Seven in Baghdad Market-Police, Medical Sources
headline.print_headline: Suicide Bomb Attack Kills Seven in Baghdad Market-Police, Medical Sources
